actions.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

description: Amendment sought to delete the provisions of the bill that require that tolls collected on bridges connecting Brooklyn and Staten Island, New York, may only be collected on vehicles arriving on Staten Island.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 23 in the Congressional Record of September 19, 1995 to delete the provisions of the bill that require that tolls collected on bridges connecting Brooklyn and Staten Island may only be collected on vehicles arriving on Staten Island.
